# ui_input_mode enumeration

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/ui_input_mode>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:07:59.066716

---

`widget` input consumption mode.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Enumerators

The `ui_input_mode` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `None` | `widget` does not consume any input. |
| `All` | `widget` consumes all inputs |
